world_description.native_language: Luminara is a quaint village nestled in a lush valley, where magic subtly intertwines with everyday life.
world_description.target_language: Luminara es un pintoresco pueblo enclavado en un valle verde, donde la magia se entrelaza sutilmente con la vida cotidiana.

summary.native_language: Luminara has been a peaceful place for generations, renowned for its vibrant markets and friendly people.
summary.target_language: Luminara ha sido un lugar pacífico por generaciones, conocido por sus vibrantes mercados y gente amigable.

player_origin.native_language: You are a traveler from a distant land, drawn to Luminara by tales of its magical charms and unique culture.
player_origin.target_language: Eres un viajero de una tierra lejana, atraído a Luminara por cuentos de sus encantos mágicos y cultura única.

motivation.native_language: To help the villagers in their daily tasks and uncover the secrets of their enchanting world.
motivation.target_language: Ayudar a los aldeanos en sus tareas diarias y descubrir los secretos de su mundo encantador.

era.native_language: Medieval-inspired with a touch of magic.
era.target_language: Inspirado en la época medieval con un toque de magia.

atmosphere.native_language: Welcoming and vibrant, with a hint of mystery in the air.
atmosphere.target_language: Acogedor y vibrante, con un toque de misterio en el aire.

culture.native_language: Luminara's culture is rich with traditions and celebrations, reflecting the diversity of its people.
culture.target_language: La cultura de Luminara es rica en tradiciones y celebraciones, reflejando la diversidad de su gente.

description.native_language: A mystical tree that grants wisdom to those who listen to its gentle whispers.
description.target_language: Un árbol místico que otorga sabiduría a aquellos que escuchan sus suaves susurros.

description.native_language: A group dedicated to preserving the natural and magical balance of Luminara.
description.target_language: Un grupo dedicado a preservar el equilibrio natural y mágico de Luminara.

role_in_world.native_language: They ensure the village remains a harmonious place, protecting it from any dark forces.
role_in_world.target_language: Ellos aseguran que el pueblo siga siendo un lugar armonioso, protegiéndolo de cualquier fuerza oscura.

why_player_learns.native_language: To communicate effectively with the villagers and participate in their customs.
why_player_learns.target_language: Para comunicarse eficazmente con los aldeanos y participar en sus costumbres.

how_language_fits.native_language: Spanish is the primary language spoken in Luminara, essential for daily interactions and understanding the world around you.
how_language_fits.target_language: El español es el idioma principal hablado en Luminara, esencial para las interacciones diarias y para entender el mundo que te rodea.
